about_the_game:
The world has fallen to corruption. A dark force spreads across the land, consuming everything in its path. Yet, one village remains—a final bastion of purity, shielded by the ocean and mountains.

You are the village's gardener, the keeper of life. With magical seeds passed down by your father, your duty is to purify the town’s water and ensure its survival. Your apprentice—your own son—will one day inherit this sacred task. But as the corruption creeps ever closer, survival demands more than just hard work.

Sons of Dagda blends deep survivor like mechanics with a rich narrative. Forage, cultivate, and defend as you strengthen the village and forge bonds with its people. Interact with a cast of memorable characters, including your younger brother, baby sister, the town chief, a wise philosopher hermit, a skilled chef, and the ever-vigilant guard. Each has their own role to play in the village’s fate.

How long can your village resist the darkness? Will your son live to carry on your legacy? The choices you make will determine the future of the last uncorrupted home in the world.

Key Features

🌱 Survive & Cultivate – Grow and purify crops, manage resources, and keep the town fed.
🏡 A Living Village – Build relationships with unique townspeople, each with their own stories.
⚔️ Defend Against the Corruption – The darkness is relentless. Strengthen your defenses and fight for survival.
🔮 A Generational Story – Guide your son and prepare him to take your place as the next guardian.
🌍 A World in Peril – Explore the edges of corruption, uncover secrets, and fight to preserve the last sanctuary.

Do you have what it takes to keep hope alive?

Wishlist Sons of Dagda now and prepare to fight for your village’s future!
